examples.korean: If anyone’s to blame, it’s me. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 누군가 책임을 져야 한다면 그건 나예요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If anyone’s to blame, it’s me. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘Can I smoke?’ ‘If you must.’ 듣기 Add to Wordbook “담배 피워도 될까요?” “꼭 피우셔야 한다면 뭐.” Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘Can I smoke?’ ‘If you must.’ Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’ll go mad if I have to wait much longer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 더 오래 기다려야 한다면 난 미쳐 버릴 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ll go mad if I have to wait much longer. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’ll go bonkers if I have to wait any longer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 더 이상 기다려야 한다면 난 완전히 돌아 버릴 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’ll go bonkers if I have to wait any longer. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If I were asked to work on Sundays, I should resign. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나에게 일요일에 근무를 하라고 한다면 난 사직할 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: If I were asked to work on Sundays, I should resign. Add to Wordbook
